title: S3 Ep44: The Amityville Horror w/Tim Yancey - Hr.2
itunes:title: The Amityville Horror w/Tim Yancey - Hr.2
description: Darkness Radio welcomes in Radio Host and AmityvilleHorror.com webmaster Tim Yancey to the program.  Tim maintained a close relationship to George Lutz up until the time he died.  Tim recaps the case with us on this programs and gives us unique perspective from George's outlook on things.
itunes:author: Darkness Radio
dc:creator: Darkness Radio
